text: Greeniopsis is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. The genus is endemic to the Philippines. ==Species== *Greeniopsis discolor *Greeniopsis euphlebia *Greeniopsis megalantha *Greeniopsis multiflora *Greeniopsis pubescens *Greeniopsis sibuyanensis ==References== Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Aleisanthieae Category:Taxa named by Elmer Drew Merrill
title: Greeniopsis
